## Problem

Describe the problem this feature would solve. What is frustrating or missing?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this working.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you have thought about.

## Additional Context

Any other information, mockups, or references that help explain the request.
